title: Carnal Conspiracies
description: A Leanpub.com BESTSELLER 7 months running!! The future has never looked this daunting. In 2110, Multi-national drug companies exploit a super-drug and employ illegal sex cartels to keep governments weak; sanctioned assassins mix business with family feuds; and a New Age Master Consultant known as Robert Manis keeps his own personal score. He has 72 hours to acquire the Vice Presidents kidnapped daughter before the culprits go public with an incriminating video of the daughter and other members of the executive cabinet engaged in various sexual acts. Robert Manis has two clear orders; get the girl; and of the rest "Kill them ALL."
author: James Lee Nathan III
